coexistence_simulator.entities.stationary_object

Stationary simulation entity.

This module defines StationaryObject, a helper for entities that do not move during a scenario. The class inherits from coexistence_simulator.entities.entity_base.EntityBase and adds a single Boolean flag that marks the object as active (transmitting or receiving) or passive.

Example

```python from coexistence_simulator.entities.stationary_object import StationaryObject

obj = StationaryObject(

object_id=”tower01”, position=[38.8895, -77.0353, 70.0], # latitude, longitude, altitude (m) active=True,

) print(obj.position) # numpy array in degrees and meters ```

Classes

StationaryObject(object_id, position[, active])

Fixed‑location entity.
